    Scala Adapters

    A flexible two-column Jekyll theme. Perfect for personal sites, blogs, and portfolios hosted on GitHub or your own server.
    Latest release v4.10.1

    Install Now

    Super Customizable

    Everything from the menus, sidebars, comments, and more can be configured or set with YAML Front Matter.

    Learn More

    Responsive Layouts

    Built on HTML5 + CSS3. All layouts are fully responsive with helpers to augment your content.
